metadata.name: Squares 1
metadata.description:
EDITION 1 OF 1  

Title: Squares  
Artist: Godwits  
Year: 2023  
Smart Contract By: Manifold  
Artist Royalty: 7.5%  

"Squares" is a non-generative code collection that was created one by one by the designer using graphic software. The pieces were designed to combine minimalism, post-painterly abstraction using compressionism (Also used in JPEG by Jan Robert Leegte), and color theory with digital colors while giving homage to the pixel in 3D.  

"Art is art. Everything else is everything else."  
-Ad Reinhardt  

Limited to personal non-commercial use and resale rights of NFT are granted.  
All other terms & rights are reserved to Abstract Art Labs LLC.
